response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its immense value to you, I am confident it's worth more than $1,000,000. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an outstanding opportunity to maximize your investment while gaining a competitive edge in your market. Please let me know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1150000}
